headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords that you want to get recommended hashtags for. If you specify multiple unrelated keywords and set operator to AND , it is possible that no recommended hashtags are returned. Max size: 10.

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: The operator to be used between the keywords. Enum values: AND : Recommended hashtags will be generated based on all the keywords specified in keywords . OR : Recommended hashtags will be generated separately for each individual keyword in keywords . Default value: AND .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of error codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: input_keyword
fields.description: Returned only when operator is set to OR and more than one keyword is specified in keywords in the request. The specific keyword for which the recommended hashtag is generated. For instance, if the hashtag "#gametime" is recommended for the keyword "game", the returned input_keyword will be "game" , and keyword will be "#gametime" .

fields.name: keyword_id
fields.description: Hashtag keyword ID. It can be passed to the action_category_ids field when creating an ad group using /adgroup/create/ . You need to set action_scene to HASHTAG_RELATED simultaneously to target users who watched TikTok videos with the hashtag.

fields.name: keyword_status
fields.description: Keyword status. Enum values: ONLINE (available for use), OFFLINE (not available for use).
